item.title: ARC Raiders Delays Upcoming Expedition Project
item.content:encoded:
Embark Studios has delayed the upcoming next part of the ARC Raiders‚Äô Expedition Project. The Expedition, which now opens a few days later, will give you new items but practically wipe out your progress.

One of 2025‚Äôs hottest games has been the extraction shooter ARC Raiders. Made by Embark Studios (The Finals), the shooter has been quite popular with players and streamers. From peace pacts to all-out war, the title has already topped the most-searched games on Google and has consistently broken player records on Steam. On the roadmap, it was teased that the next expedition departure would be announced. Now, Embark Studios has revealed more info on the next Expedition, including a two-day delay.

ARC Raiders Expedition Project Now Starts December 17th, Launching December 22nd.

In a new blog on the ARC Raiders site, Embark Studios revealed that the next Expedition won‚Äôt start its window on December 15th as planned. Instead, the Expedition window will last from December 17th to the 22nd. Now, instead of players leaving on December 20th, the 22nd is now when those who signed up will depart The Rust Belt on their Caravan.

While the details of the Expedition are known, the blog mentions some information regarding it. For one, player progress will be wiped, which includes blueprints, skill tree, level, stash, workshop, and crafting abilities. However, permanent upgrades like more inventory slots, XP boosts, and skill points will be included. It is a big choice to go on the Expedition, but seeing how ARC Raiders has shaped up to be since release, it does seem like a risk worth taking.

What do you think of ARC Raiders‚Äô expedition delay? Are you going to participate in it? How have you been enjoying the game so far? Leave a comment below and on the official Insider Gaming Discord!

For more ARC Raiders, check out coverage of the server status and Ninja‚Äôs opinion. Make sure to subscribe to the weekly newsletter!

item.title: Duct Tape Challenge Codes (December 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Duct Tape Challenge monthly redeem codes for December 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including Pets, Potions and much more. 

Are you a fan of racing games with a quirky side? If so, Duct Tape Challenge is a Roblox game that will definitely be worth your time. Despite being a car-related game on paper, Duct Tape Challenge offers an alternate experience to players, with the main objective being to tear through multiple layers of duct tape. Players must upgrade their cars to make them faster and give them more destructive power, as the number of layers destroyed determines how many coins they earn at the end of the run. 

These coins can be used for various things within the game, including upgrading cars, buying pets, stat multipliers and a lot more. These rewards encourage players to keep grinding and beat their personal bests, as the power spikes from even the smallest of upgrades are clear to see. Although simply playing through the game will give players the resources they need to progress, using redeem codes can be a good way to get ahead of the competition. 

Active Duct Tape Challenge Codes

  • Thanksgiving ‚Äì Candy Skull Pet + Potions

Expired Duct Tape Challenge Codes

As of the writing of this article, there are no expired Duct Tape Challenge codes. However, considering the popularity the game has garnered in recent months, new codes are likely to be released. When new codes drop, old ones tend to expire, and when that happens, this section of the article will be updated to reflect as such. 

How To Redeem Duct Tape Challenge Codes

Redeeming codes in Duct Tape Challenge is a simple process with no prerequisite steps. It‚Äôs as simple as navigating through the menus and inputting one of the active codes into the correct text box. For players who may be new to the game, however, here‚Äôs a ste-by-step guide: 

  1. Open Roblox and launch Duct Tape Challenge.
  2. Click on the Shop button on the left side of the screen.
  3. Scroll to the right until you see the ‚ÄúCodes‚Äù section with a text box. 
  4. Input one of the active codes listed above into the text box. 
  5. Click on the yellow ‚ÄòRedeem‚Äô button to claim your rewards. 

How To Get More Duct Tape Challenge Codes

New codes are usually released through the game‚Äôs official Discord server, or sometimes through the developers‚Äô socials as well. However, keeping track of these can be a hassle, especially considering that players are not notified when a code expires. That‚Äôs where this page can be a lifesaver, as we update this article as soon as any new codes drop. Bookmark this page to never miss out on any free rewards again. 

Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for King Legacy, Hypershot, and MonsterVerze. Also, check out the Insider Gaming Discord server.
